body.p:
KENTUCKY PENITENTIARY,
H. I. TODD, KEEPER AND LESSEE.
Office Kentucky Penitentiary,
Frankfort, Ky., Novr. 10th, 1865.
His Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Governor of Ky -- Dear Sir
Enclose I send a list of three men that have served their terms and wish to be restored to citizenship Pleas give each of them a pardon they have behaved themselves well --

Respectfully
H. I. Todd
for Markham

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
George Storter for murder
Jack Hatch for stealing money
Geo W Brown for Purjury
Pardoned 9 Nov 1865
each for 2 years Oct term 1863
served out term
